thumb.title: The Banality Of It All [original song, Vocaloid, Taku/Haruka]
thumb.description: LyricsLet the storm breakLet the storm break on meWhen balance failsPlease stumble into meLet the storm breakLet the rain fall hard on meNot all days shineDark shades wear well on meBut first let’s sweep the leaves clearAnd polish things that just aren’t dustyAnd what about the driveway?Let’s keep those leaves from playing wildlyLet the storm breakLet the storm break on meAlthough you're goneKeep stirring thoughts in meBut first let’s sweep the leaves clearAnd polish things that just aren’t dustyAnd what about the driveway?Let’s keep those leaves from playing wildlyBut first let’s sweep the leaves clearAnd polish things that just aren’t dustyAnd what about the driveway?Let’s keep those leaves from playing wildly
